rows.label: tlk41300072_01_msg0001
rows.name:
It's pathetic... In Gula, I
used to gather my own food, but
now I just receive handouts.

rows.label: tlk41300072_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I fled to Acedia after being chased
out by Superbia, but... this country
is the cause of the war.

rows.label: tlk41300072_01_msg0003
rows.name:
The Blades of Superbia
are managed here.

rows.label: tlk41300072_01_msg0004
rows.name:
To prevent war, they should just stop
sending Blades anywhere. It's like
they're just handing out weapons.
